typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	CorpusContainer as string,
	CorpusFolder as string,
	RootContainer as string,
	RootFolder as string,
	Entity as string
}
source(output(
		vendor_id as string,
		pickup_datetime as string,
		dropoff_datetime as string,
		store_and_forward as string,
		rate_code_id as string,
		pickup_longitude as double,
		pickup_latitude as double,
		dropoff_longitude as double,
		dropoff_latitude as double,
		passener_count as integer,
		trip_distance as double,
		fare_amount as double,
		extra as double,
		mta_tax as double,
		tip_amount as double,
		tolls_amount as double,
		ehail_fee as double,
		total_amount as double,
		payment_type as string,
		trip_type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		vendor_id as string,
		pickup_datetime as string,
		dropoff_datetime as string,
		store_and_foreward as string,
		rate_code_id as short,
		pickup_longitude as double,
		pickup_latitude as double,
		dropoff_longitude as double,
		dropoff_latitude as double,
		passenger_count as short,
		trip_distance as decimal(18,2),
		fare_amount as decimal(18,2),
		extra as decimal(18,2),
		mta_tax as decimal(18,2),
		tip_amount as decimal(18,2),
		tolls_amount as decimal(18,2),
		ehail_fee as decimal(18,2),
		total_amount as decimal(18,2),
		payment_type as short,
		trip_type as string
	),
	entity: ($Entity),
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'manifest',
	folderPath: ($RootFolder),
	fileSystem: ($RootContainer),
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true,
	corpusPath: ($CorpusFolder),
	corpusStore: 'adlsgen2',
	adlsgen2_fileSystem: ($CorpusContainer),
	truncate: false,
	mapColumn(
		vendor_id,
		pickup_datetime,
		dropoff_datetime,
		store_and_forward,
		rate_code_id,
		pickup_longitude,
		pickup_latitude,
		dropoff_longitude,
		dropoff_latitude,
		passener_count,
		trip_distance,
		fare_amount,
		extra,
		mta_tax,
		tip_amount,
		tolls_amount,
		ehail_fee,
		total_amount,
		payment_type,
		trip_type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
